data.title: Candidate with no votes demands recount because he ‘voted for himself’
Canada's police begin wearing body cameras. If an interaction with the public is not recorded when it should have been, the officer may be subject to a discipline process.
Over 1000 Japanese Citizens Band Together To Sue Their Government Over Participation In TPP
Moroccan King Mohammed VI has ordered that laws restricting abortion be loosened, allowing it in the case of rape, incest, danger to the mother's health or fetal malformation
U.S. Special Operations forces kill ISIS commander Abu Sayyaf in Syria raid
Former Egyptian president Mohammed Morsi sentenced to death.
Turkey arrests 8 of its own soldiers after they intercepted trucks that were smuggling arms to Jihadists in Syria
Chechnya’s leader gives approval for 46-year-old police chief to wed 17-year-old girl in forced marriage
Saudi jets target and destroy 1200 year old historic mosque and 13th century castle, among other Yemeni heritage sites

Mysterious Caribbean Shipwreck Identified - Wreck full of sword blades, scissors & mule shoes turns out to be the 'Nuestra Señora de Encarnación', a Spanish ship that sank in 1681 during a storm. Very few Spanish merchant naos have ever been found & even fewer found in such amazing condition.
